sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Software Package
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
-- all DECLARE @FirstSeen DATETIME = '20180101'
SELECT CorrelationID , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , 'Software' AS Category , 'Package' AS SubCategory , name AS [name] , name AS [short_description] , manufacturer , ostype , SoftwareVersion , installs , CAST(name + '_:::_' + CASE WHEN SoftwareVersion = '' THEN 'NULL' ELSE SoftwareVersion END AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as [key] , 'Software' AS SourceName FROM ( SELECT CAST(tblSoftwareUni.SoftID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS CorrelationID , CAST(tblSoftwareUni.softwareName AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS [name] , tblSoftwareUni.softwarePublisher AS [manufacturer] , tblSoftwareUni.ostype , OSApplications.softID , CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) SoftwareVersion , count(*) as installs FROM tblSoftwareUni
INNER JOIN ( -- include windows software where the asset still exists SELECT softID , softwareVersion AS SoftwareVersion FROM tblSoftware WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tblAssets WHERE tblSoftware.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssets.FirstSeen > @FirstSeen)
UNION ALL -- include mac software where the asset still exists SELECT softID , Version AS SoftwareVersion FROM tblMacApplications WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tblAssets WHERE tblMacApplications.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssets.FirstSeen > @FirstSeen)
--UNION ALL ---- include linux software where the asset still exists --SELECT -- SoftwareUniID AS SoftID -- , Version AS SoftwareVersion --FROM -- tblLinuxSoftware --WHERE -- EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tblAssets WHERE tblLinuxSoftware.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID AND tblAssets.AssetType = COALESCE(@DemoAssetType, tblAssets.AssetType))
)OSApplications ON tblSoftwareUni.SoftID = OSApplications.softID GROUP BY CAST(tblSoftwareUni.SoftID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) , tblSoftwareUni.softwareName , tblSoftwareUni.softwarePublisher , tblSoftwareUni.ostype , OSApplications.softID , CAST(COALESCE(OSApplications.SoftwareVersion,'') AS VARCHAR(MAX)) --HAVING -- count(*) > 1
)software_packages ORDER BY installs
